data.message: Anyone knows what's the Only Defect of this Idea?
Defect? hmmm, maybe trying to convince the police you were only "playing"? :D
People will think that you take photos of them :D w 3eesh ba2a :D
THE BIG DEFECT IS: You can seriously fall down looking to your iphone and not paying attention to some stairs :D

the idea is briliant, and is simple to make, is using phone camera for face recognition if the aim circle of gun matched on same direction of the user face while shooting this what gonna make you killed. I guess the game maybe has auto discovery for nearby opponents around you like an alarm or something like in the video maybe by using gps and 3g, but in this case is gonna really kill your phone battery and also I may try this game for one or two. but playing this all times ? c'mon ClashOfClans still best game for mobiles :P

You don't need face recognition at all. I saw the same idea but without the dependency on using your phone while playing. and the phone is only a score machine.

The video is in spanish, but you can see the video: http://vimeo.com/99256872
